article_title: Obamacare Focused 'On The Wrong Problem,' Ignores The Middle Class

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Despite the enduring unpopularity of Obamacare, Congressional Democrats have up to now stood by their health care law, allowing that “it’s not perfect” but that they are proud of their votes to pass it. That all changed on Tuesday, when the Senate’s third-highest-ranking Democrat—New York’s Chuck Schumer—declared that “we took [the public’s] mandate and put all our focus on the wrong problem—health care reform…When Democrats focused on health care, the average middle-class person thought, ‘The Democrats aren’t paying enough attention to me.’”
og.title: Sen. Chuck Schumer: Obamacare Focused 'On The Wrong Problem,' Ignores The Middle Class
